name: Press To The Space
description:
This a mini game made for the 1-Button Jam 2022.

One little astronaut went for a space walk and his sandwich fall down on earth so he went to its rescue but now it's your duty to sent him back to the space. Just pressing the space of your keyboard will ignite the jetpack but be aware of the fuel consume if it goes to zero you'll fall again to earth.

All works made by Álvaro R.R.

Controls Press Space for every thing
